column3: Verifies that the function returns 0 when the input is non-numeric or invalid.
Ensures that the function returns 0 when the input contains a single zero.
Verifies that the function correctly adds two comma-separated numbers.
Checks that the function handles both newlines and commas as delimiters.
Ensures that numbers greater than 1000 are ignored in the sum calculation.
Verifies that the function can handle a custom delimiter, specifically the semicolon in this case.
Ensures that multiple newline delimiters are handled correctly and that numbers are summed accordingly.
Confirms that negative numbers are ignored or handled as expected, and the sum excludes them.
Ensures that the function returns 0 when the input is an empty string.
Verifies that the function can handle custom delimiters defined by regex patterns such as [***].
